Product Name: Micellar Cleansing Water (For Sensitive Skin) 400ml by Garnier
Review: Using garnier cleansing water to remove my make up makes my skin feels soft and light on the skin. It removes an incredible amount with just a few daps of it to the cotton wool. However, it takes a while and a few wipes to remove the mascara off properly.   Just using a few daps, This cleansing water does do the trick to removing my make up almost completely.

Product Name: Micellar Cleansing Water (For Sensitive Skin) 400ml by Garnier
Review: This is my first time using the garnier all-in-1 micellar cleansing water.  It's very effective in removing my makeup, especially my eye makeup.  I only need 2 piece of cotton square puff to clean half my face.  Kuddos to the product!

Product Name: Micellar Cleansing Water (For Sensitive Skin) 400ml by Garnier
Review: Have always used an oil based make up remover but this product was able to remove my make up, and left my skin feeling clean. However, it's abit hard to remove waterproof make up, so I still need the oil based make up remover.

Product Name: Micellar Cleansing Water (For Sensitive Skin) 400ml by Garnier
Review: I tried the Garnier Micellar Cleansing water for sensitive skin and I love how it leaves my skin fresh and clean! I wet just one piece of cotton and it was able to cover all my face including my neck area. It is unscented as well so I'm pretty sure there's no alcohol or any harmful ingredients added. My skin is very sensitive and will always become red when irritated, I didn't feel any sting at all. My favorite is that it doesn't leave my skin dry after using it. Definitely will use again!

Product Name: Micellar Cleansing Water (For Sensitive Skin) 400ml by Garnier
Review: Thanks Try and review for letting have the chance to try it. Recently I also just bought  Micellar Cleansing Water but a different brand there is a big difference for this two. I more likely prefer the Garnier, after trying i found out that it is more effective on removing oil and my light make up. I like it more than the one I bought in pharmacy store i had use more cotton and more micellar water for the other brand. For Garnier i used only one that is a thumbs up for me make it 2 thumbs up.

Product Name: Micellar Cleansing Water (For Sensitive Skin) 400ml by Garnier
Review: Indeed, used only 1 cotton pad to remove my make up for the entire face. I feel refreshed and it feels like I already washed my face with a soap.    For the packaging, I prefer smaller size since expiration is just for 6M. And for the 400ml for 6M is too much as you only need a bit amount to remove makeup, unless you wear make up every single day. And it is quite pricey compare to other micellar cleansing water.

Product Name: Micellar Cleansing Water (For Sensitive Skin) 400ml by Garnier
Review: I have been using other micellar water and I must say Garnier's micellar water removes makeup much easily. With 2 cotton pad and i'm done!

Product Name: Micellar Cleansing Water (For Sensitive Skin) 400ml by Garnier
Review: Cleanser was gentle on my skin. It didn't leave my skin red or painful after using it, compared to others I've used before. Price wise, definitely a good investment. This will be my go to cleanser from now on!

Product Name: Micellar Cleansing Water (For Sensitive Skin) 400ml by Garnier
Review: I have used other brands of micellar water before and i find that garnier's version is much more gentle and remove makeup really easily. It is also hydrating for me as i have dry skin. Would definitely recommend everyone to try.

Product Name: Micellar Cleansing Water (For Sensitive Skin) 400ml by Garnier
Review: Removes most make up after 1 swipe.  Removes all make up after 2 swipes. Was unfortunate enough to accidentally get some make up remover in  eye, but it didn't irritate the eye much. Has this unsettling smell when used but overall, a good and effective make up remover.

Product Name: Micellar Cleansing Water (For Sensitive Skin) 400ml by Garnier
Review: Yesterday night was my first try from Garnier brand. It was safely delivered to me days ago. *Thank you Garnier!*    I was so eager to try coz firstly, it mentioned that its removal for light makeup (which i am. I have been a light makeup for 3years now. Before that i used to have heavy makeup on).  Secondly, it mentioned its for sensitive skin. I have this sensitivity issue under my eyes & nose area, for years now. Yesterday night, tried and tested. And IM LOVING IT! I don't feel the tingling heaty on my sensitive areas though. And best best, after removing it, you can just straightaway go to bed. Really! No need to rinse after removing. Wow Garnier. I have used other brand, which is have been my fave. But that particular brand when i have used, the sticky feeling exist, so i have to rinse to get rid of the feeling ok my face. For garnier, its not though. Amazing! Garnier MW, you are on my fave list now! THANK YOU #GARNIERSG for sending over to me to try. Love it!

Product Name: Micellar Cleansing Water (For Sensitive Skin) 400ml by Garnier
Review: Garnier All-in-1 Micellar Cleansing Water takes my makeup off gently and in one swipe. I absolutely love it as it doesn't leave my skin feeling greasy but mosturised at the same time. No oily residue! I am most impressed that when I am taking off eye makeup, I don't need to do a lot of rubbing plus it doesn't burn at all!

Product Name: Micellar Cleansing Water (For Sensitive Skin) 400ml by Garnier
Review: I have sensitive skin and this remover does it's job without irritating my skin further like most removers do. It's able to remove most face makeup effectively, but wouldn't use for eye makeup.

Product Name: Micellar Cleansing Water (For Sensitive Skin) 400ml by Garnier
Review: Good cleansing water to remove my BB cream effectively. Skin felt mositurised and non sticky. Worth it for the price.

Product Name: Micellar Cleansing Water (For Sensitive Skin) 400ml by Garnier
Review: I have acne prone skin and i wear makeup on most days. This helps to remove my makeup at the end of my wear even if i have a setting spray on. However i do feel after i use it that it leaves a slight film to my face and that i would still need to go in with a cleanser afterwards to feel more fresher. It is not a bad product overall.

Product Name: Micellar Cleansing Water (For Sensitive Skin) 400ml by Garnier
Review: I wear make up on a daily basis and I hate having to take it all off at the end of the day. However with the Garnier Micellar water, it doesnt take much time and effort. It is so gentle and effective in removing my make-up, even my water proof mascara and eyeliner! Been using it for over a year because of how amazing it is.

Product Name: Micellar Cleansing Water (For Sensitive Skin) 400ml by Garnier
Review: Tried for 1 month. After applying not dry and also feeling not sticky too. overall just suitable for me

Product Name: Micellar Cleansing Water (For Sensitive Skin) 400ml by Garnier
Review: It is really gentle on skin. Just a quick, gentle swipe can remove most of my makeup. It is usually dreadful for me to remove my makeup after a long day but this product made it easier as it can take less than 5 mins to remove a full face makeup.  The price is reasonable and packaging is simple yet elegant

Review: I highly recommend using the garnier micellar water as a makeup cleanser. It is gentle for everyday wear and doesn't tug on your skin or leave behind an oily residue as other residues. Product Name: [Bundle of 2s] Garnier Micellar Cleansing Water Pink (125 ml)
Review: Being blessed with ultra sensitive combi skin, I'm always searching for the ultimate facial cleanser. But this Micellar water is my holy grail - it's easy to clean my make up and it doesn't strip my face of its natural oil. So glad to be given this opportunity to try this!

Product Name: [Bundle of 2s] Garnier Micellar Cleansing Water Pink (125 ml)
Review: I have extremely sensitive skin and I am not able to use any oil-based make-up removers. I have tried other brands of micellar cleansing water before, but I feel that Garnier's All-In-1 Micellar Cleansing Water is very suitable for my sensitive skin and it works wonderfully!    Garnier's All-In-1 Micellar Cleansing Water removes my make-up with just a single and quick swipe, and it also leaves my skin feeling fresh and non-sticky too. Thus, there is no need to wash my face afterwards! I personally use Garnier's All-In-1 Micellar Cleansing Water to remove the dusts, oil and impurities off my face at the end of a busy and hectic day and I love it a lot!    The packaging is really cute and it is affordable too! I would continue to use this and I would also highly recommend this to anyone who has sensitive skin and is looking to invest in good micellar cleansing water.

Review: Indeed, used only 1 cotton pad to remove my make up for the entire face. I feel refreshed and it feels like I already washed my face with a soap.    For the packaging, I prefer smaller size since expiration is just for 6M. And for the 400ml for 6M is too much as you only need a bit amount to remove makeup, unless you wear make up every single day. And it is quite pricey compare to other micellar cleansing water.

Product Name: [Bundle of 2s] Garnier Micellar Cleansing Water Pink (125 ml)
Review: Yesterday night was my first try from Garnier brand. It was safely delivered to me days ago. *Thank you Garnier!*    I was so eager to try coz firstly, it mentioned that its removal for light makeup (which i am. I have been a light makeup for 3years now. Before that i used to have heavy makeup on).  Secondly, it mentioned its for sensitive skin. I have this sensitivity issue under my eyes & nose area, for years now. Yesterday night, tried and tested. And IM LOVING IT! I don't feel the tingling heaty on my sensitive areas though. And best best, after removing it, you can just straightaway go to bed. Really! No need to rinse after removing. Wow Garnier. I have used other brand, which is have been my fave. But that particular brand when i have used, the sticky feeling exist, so i have to rinse to get rid of the feeling ok my face. For garnier, its not though. Amazing! Garnier MW, you are on my fave list now! THANK YOU #GARNIERSG for sending over to me to try. Love it!

Product Name: [Bundle of 2s] Garnier Micellar Cleansing Water Pink (125 ml)
Review: Garnier All-in-1 Micellar Cleansing Water takes my makeup off gently and in one swipe. I absolutely love it as it doesn't leave my skin feeling greasy but mosturised at the same time. No oily residue! I am most impressed that when I am taking off eye makeup, I don't need to do a lot of rubbing plus it doesn't burn at all!

Product Name: [Bundle of 2s] Garnier Micellar Cleansing Water Pink (125 ml)
Review: Cleanser was gentle on my skin. It didn't leave my skin red or painful after using it, compared to others I've used before. Price wise, definitely a good investment. This will be my go to cleanser from now on!

Review: Removes most make up after 1 swipe.  Removes all make up after 2 swipes. Was unfortunate enough to accidentally get some make up remover in  eye, but it didn't irritate the eye much. Has this unsettling smell when used but overall, a good and effective make up remover.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: It removes everything even my stubborn waterproof mascara out pretty quickly without having to scrub out hard. It's very soft and friendly to skin

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Using this for a month now. And I can say that it's very light on the skin, it almost feel like I am applying plain water on my face. I love that it doesn't have any strong smell because my skin is too sensitive! Love to use it everyday to clean my make up. Highly recommend!

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I use this every day to take off my makeup. It never irritates my sensitive skin and does a good job at removing my makeup. (Except the really waterproof mascara.) I use the waterproof makeup removing version for that. Also a great product!

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I used to use the Bioderma micellar water, but have since switched over to Garnier as it leaves my face feeling fresh and clean and what's more, it's cheaper and hence worth the money!

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I highly recommend using the garnier micellar water as a makeup cleanser. It is gentle for everyday wear and doesn't tug on your skin or leave behind an oily residue as other residues.    I'm only using foundation, concealer and eyebrow pencil on my face, and with only a simple circular swipe on my face with the cleanser, its removed completely ! (Pic 2) Not only does it removes makeup, it removes the dirt on it as well. After using the micellar water, there is no need to rinse your face afterwards.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Love that it doesn't leave a tacky residue. It leaves my face feeling refreshed. Great first step in my nightly skincare routine. I am sold.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: This has no fragrance. It removes makeup really easily and cleanly. I do not need a lot of effort to remove my makeup. It is the best micellar water i tried so far. Will repurchase!

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I have been using this daily for a few months now. My skin has become more appealing and much more under control now. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone!!

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: It cleans off even heavy makeup very easily. I often use it and it does not feel harsh on the skin. It's suitable for sensitive skin and its formula feels light and refreshing. Overall, it's a good product that is worth the purchase!

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Easy application on wanting to remove my makeup, glides on the face easily. Bonus is when u're still gd if u dont dounle cleanse ur face.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Cleans my makeup well, although when im wearing full makeup on. 90% makeup clear on one go of cotton swipe.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: What i love about Garnier miscellar cleansing water is that unlike other miscellar water, it's not sticky once you spill that on your face!!

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I've tried this and the waterproof version(blue cap) and I prefer the one for waterproof makeup much more just because it removes makeup better/faster. I wear light makeup with long-wearing liquid lipstick (KAT VON D) and I'm one who prefers to remove makeup all at one go instead of having to use a separate eye/lip makeup remover. While this still works, it just requires a little bit more effort to remove makeup entirely. I also like that this doesn't irritate my skin or eyes!

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I have used this previously to remove all makeup on my face, including eye make-up. I now use it to remove only eye makeup (not waterproof); it doesn't sting my eyes and it has never made me break out.    A bonus is that it is really affordable.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Good for lightwear makeup as indicated on bottle.  Cleans efficently and effectively. However, for waterproof makeup, i still prefer oil based remover to reduce the amount of tugging and rubbing

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: A very good chance to try this Micellar cleansing water from Garnier as my allergies suddenly made it's appearance again.    Review:   This micellar water does what it says. It removes my eyes and lips make-up instantly in 1 cotton pad. It is a very easy to use product as I just need to gently press, hold, and wipe my face in circular motion.    My face never shows redness during the two days I use this product. It cleanses, soothes and more importantly, it doesn't irritate my sensitive skin.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: When I purchased this product, i was a little bit hesitant but when I got to try this product, it really satisfies me. It's really nice to use. It's really recommendable for others to try out. The packaging is nice.The way it completely removes your make up is so legit. And it is legit amazing. I would really love.to buy this product again. And I would recommend it to my friends so that they can witness how beautiful and amazing this product is. I just really love how it feels on my skin and face. I just really love everything about it.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I like how this product remove make up in an instant. No need to use several times just to remove your make up. Highly recommended with people who has sensitive skin.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: First time using Garnier's Micellar water, it can cleanse my light makeup well with 1 cotton pad and it is very convenient to use. It can even remove my waterproof eyeliner well. For mascara, I will still prefer the oil type of remover.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Received this product and enjoyed using it. It was light on my skin and didn't dry out my skin when I applied it. Definitely would recommend it to my friends and family who are looking for a good make-up remover.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Removing makeup has never been this effortless before. it does not leave an oily feeling behind like other brands of remover. I will definitely use it again and the best part is, its suitable for sensitive skin. It does not sting my face like some products would!!

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Love how it doesn't irritate my eyes when i remove my eye make up and also the fragrance free as some people may be allergic to certain scent. Suitable for my super sensitive skin too as i tend to react almost immediately to a wrong product.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: In one wipe, it removes most eye make-up efficiently. highly recommended for removal of light make-up. For heavy make-up, just wipe off a few more times and repeat as per desired. Product has a light pleasant scent and is gentle, not irritable to sensitive skin like mine. Very convenient and easy to use. Works like what it said.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Its a nice product..although im not really using make up..but i thinkit wouldbe useful for those busy women...than you

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: The Garnier Micellar Water is a gentle cleanser that removes make up in one swipe! It is not drying to the skin and is good for sensitive skin :)

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I love how the product removes my makeup completely and keeps my face clean. You don't have to rinse your face after using the makeup remover. I only used 2 facial cottons to remove my makeup. It's that great. Just ensure not to pour too much of the solution onto your fails cotton, as it will start to create foam when you are swiping the cotton over your face. Overall, it's a great product! I'm loving it!

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: It is a gentle cleanser that can remove make up in just 1 swipe! It makes my skin smooth afterwards. I will definitely buy this again! It's a amazing product!

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: This brand of micelles water is a great starter brand and item to trying out or implementing it into your skincare for the first time.     Price-wise, it is definitely affordable. Definitely soft on the skin. However, would require you to a few more applications than the other name brand micellar water (which is twice as more expensive) to remove all traceable of makeup. Despite that, I think due to that, it's is definitely safe for sensitive skin. Fragrance-free, you would probably think it is just normal water but do not worry. You have not been duped! :)

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: The Garnier Micellar Water is god sent! With just one wipe, I can clean away my eyeliner! It helps a lot when I have eyelash extensions. The product is also very gentle on the skin. I have very sensitive skin around my lips but the product did not cause any reaction when I use it to wipe away my lipstick! Amazing!

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Love how this product removes most of my makeup at the end of each day. Eventhough I have oily, sensitive skin, this product has never caused any issues at all. In fact, it makes my skin feel extremely refreshed and helps to mattify my skin. I am currently using this product as my go-to makeup remover because of how amazing it is. LOVE!

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: The cleansing water is a five star product! I love how it remove my make up in a single swipe on my face! It doesn't have stony fragrance which is one thing I like! And most importantly, it doesn't cause my skin to be dry(indeed gentle to sensitive skin!!) .     I love love love this!

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: First try out this Ganier Micellar Water, it is so gentle to skin, no sting sensation on skin somemore it can remove waterproof makeup very clean with just 1 cotton pad! It is so amazing!

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I love how it remove my eye makeup by just one swipe and is so convenient to remove any other make up

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I love how this product removes my makeup easily. It is also good for people with dry or sensitive skin. What's best is that it is not oily and it makes my face feels really smooth afterwards.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: It is gentle on skin, yet clean thoroughly.   No remaining make up on cotton when i clean 2nd time using toner.  Used for two nights and no redness or allergic reaction. I have combined skin and i dont feel tightness or tingling on cheeks area.  Will definitely recommend to friends.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Being blessed with ultra sensitive combi skin, I'm always searching for the ultimate facial cleanser. I've tried numerous cleansers and cleansing tools including Clarisonic, but they always make my skin feel tight and my face would itch the next few days, causing unsightly dry patches of skin. But this Micellar water is my holy grail - it's easy to clean my make up and it doesn't strip my face of its natural oil. So glad to be given this opportunity to try this!

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: It doesn't leave my face feeling tight and stripped of moisture , don't have to wash face after removing makeup with this product , and wont break me out , it also doesn't hurt the eyes when removing eye makeup . Claims to remove light make up but it removes my heavy makeup wear as good too . Also doesn't have an annoying aftermath of using where the skin feels uncomfortable like other cleansing water does . I feel squeaky clean after every use and even use it if im not wearing makeup but wants to clean my face .

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: As my face is conbination skin , so i don't like to use oily based makeup remover and yet this is the best worth product that i have used all the way. It clean all the makeup , eye makeup , lipstick .

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Love this product since it has no fragrances and it wipes away my makeup in one swipe! it doesnt leave any residue and doesnt leave the skin dry. it also doesnt leave skin feeling tacky and its not harsh to the skin either. Would totally recommend this to my family and friends.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I am able to remove my make up effortlessly even my eyeliner ! Using GARNIER micellar cleansing water , I am able to remove my makeup fully by only using with just 2 cotton pads the best point is that it is not oily at all and it does not have any scent.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I've switched to Micrellar type  formulas an about a year ago and have tried various brands.     Ganier micellar cleanings stands out because it doesn't Not sting my eyes.     Perfect for removing eye makeup. Formula Is not oily and gentle on THe the skin.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: This product is amazing! It really does it jobs, in just one swipe your makeup is remove. Not much product is needed to take off your makeup too. After removing my makeup with it, when i cleanse my face with a face wash the water is almost clear. Really love it and will buy again and recommend it to my girlfriends.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Removes all my make up in one swipe and leaves no sticky residue behind. Great for a fast cleanse with no work. Doesn't case break out. There is no need for double cleaning.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Removed makeup effortlessly, no tugging on eyelids, especially to remove eyeliner and mascara. Fully removed all makeup residue with just 2 cotton pads. Face felt smooth and not drying after using the micellar water.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Easy to remove my makeup, lip and eye...this micelar cleansing water pink suitable for my oily skin, after use not sticky...i like it

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I have tested this product on my hands with makeup such as foundation, eyeliner, eyeshadow, lipstick, eyebrow products. Application is really easy to use, however, it is really big and bulky for travel usage. Application does not come with any weird smells or fragrance which is good which means that there isnt any additional ingredients. Makeup is easily removed with this micellar water, but it could not remove the liquid lipstick and left a smudge. After usage, it leaves skin soft and smooth, not tacky like the other brand i have used. Overall, good product! highly recommend.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: The Micellar Water is amazing! The scentless makeup remover looked exactly like water since it's crystal clear and scentless. Despite that, it removed my makeup effortlessly. My face feels really clean and smooth after each time I use the Micellar Water. It is also gentle to the skin as my face does not get red after using the product. Would definitely purchase more once I'm done with this bottle!

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: First time trying Micellar Cleansing Water to remove my make up was quite pleased of the results. Because I have sensitive skin and using wrong kind of cleansing products will cause a lot of outbreaks and itch.. However it does not clean waterproof make up easily..

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Nothing short of miraculous. I have noticed not only does it clean my face of all make up residue, its also helps prevent breakouts and clear breakouts when they do occur. I noticed improvement after one use. My skin is doing much better now.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Have always used an oil based make up remover but this product was able to remove my make up, and left my skin feeling clean. However, it's abit hard to remove waterproof make up, so I still need the oil based make up remover.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Using garnier cleansing water to remove my make up makes my skin feels soft and light on the skin. It removes an incredible amount with just a few daps of it to the cotton wool. However, it takes a while and a few wipes to remove the mascara off properly.   Just using a few daps, This cleansing water does do the trick to removing my make up almost completely.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: tried this and it really removed my makeup effectively. very gentle on my skin, and it was very easy to use. feels nice on my skin, would recommend!

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I have extremely sensitive skin and I am not able to use any oil-based make-up removers. I have tried other brands of micellar cleansing water before, but I feel that Garnier's All-In-1 Micellar Cleansing Water is very suitable for my sensitive skin and it works wonderfully!    Garnier's All-In-1 Micellar Cleansing Water removes my make-up with just a single and quick swipe, and it also leaves my skin feeling fresh and non-sticky too. Thus, there is no need to wash my face afterwards! I personally use Garnier's All-In-1 Micellar Cleansing Water to remove the dusts, oil and impurities off my face at the end of a busy and hectic day and I love it a lot!    The packaging is really cute and it is affordable too! I would continue to use this and I would also highly recommend this to anyone who has sensitive skin and is looking to invest in good micellar cleansing water.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: This micellar cleansing water works wonders! It removes all the makeup on my face within 2 swaps! I will definitely recommend it to friends and love ones and I will definitely buy more

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: This is my first time using the garnier all-in-1 micellar cleansing water.  It's very effective in removing my makeup, especially my eye makeup.  I only need 2 piece of cotton square puff to clean half my face.  Kuddos to the product!

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I use this product every day to remove my make-up including eye make-up and this does the job for me. It is unscented and I pour a bit onto a cotton pad and gently sweep it all over my face. But it does not remove waterproof make-up.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: This is indeed a magical water that removes makeup super easily and its no rinse feature is another plus point. Thank you!

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I have used other micellar water products in the past, but they are either too pricey or not very effective. I have already tried the Garnier Micellar water in the past and have been using it ever since. It is really as gentle as it claims, yet effective to use. What I really like about it is the price. Such a big bottle for such an affordable price! I highly recommend people to try this :)

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I tried the Garnier Micellar Cleansing water for sensitive skin and I love how it leaves my skin fresh and clean! I wet just one piece of cotton and it was able to cover all my face including my neck area. It is unscented as well so I'm pretty sure there's no alcohol or any harmful ingredients added. My skin is very sensitive and will always become red when irritated, I didn't feel any sting at all. My favorite is that it doesn't leave my skin dry after using it. Definitely will use again!

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Cleanser was gentle on my skin. It didn't leave my skin red or painful after using it, compared to others I've used before. Price wise, definitely a good investment. This will be my go to cleanser from now on!

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Yesterday night was my first try from Garnier brand. It was safely delivered to me days ago. *Thank you Garnier!*    I was so eager to try coz firstly, it mentioned that its removal for light makeup (which i am. I have been a light makeup for 3years now. Before that i used to have heavy makeup on).  Secondly, it mentioned its for sensitive skin. I have this sensitivity issue under my eyes & nose area, for years now. Yesterday night, tried and tested. And IM LOVING IT! I don't feel the tingling heaty on my sensitive areas though. And best best, after removing it, you can just straightaway go to bed. Really! No need to rinse after removing. Wow Garnier. I have used other brand, which is have been my fave. But that particular brand when i have used, the sticky feeling exist, so i have to rinse to get rid of the feeling ok my face. For garnier, its not though. Amazing! Garnier MW, you are on my fave list now! THANK YOU #GARNIERSG for sending over to me to try. Love it!

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Garnier All-in-1 Micellar Cleansing Water takes my makeup off gently and in one swipe. I absolutely love it as it doesn't leave my skin feeling greasy but mosturised at the same time. No oily residue! I am most impressed that when I am taking off eye makeup, I don't need to do a lot of rubbing plus it doesn't burn at all!

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Thanks Try and review for letting have the chance to try it. Recently I also just bought  Micellar Cleansing Water but a different brand there is a big difference for this two. I more likely prefer the Garnier, after trying i found out that it is more effective on removing oil and my light make up. I like it more than the one I bought in pharmacy store i had use more cotton and more micellar water for the other brand. For Garnier i used only one that is a thumbs up for me make it 2 thumbs up.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Indeed, used only 1 cotton pad to remove my make up for the entire face. I feel refreshed and it feels like I already washed my face with a soap.    For the packaging, I prefer smaller size since expiration is just for 6M. And for the 400ml for 6M is too much as you only need a bit amount to remove makeup, unless you wear make up every single day. And it is quite pricey compare to other micellar cleansing water.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I have been using other micellar water and I must say Garnier's micellar water removes makeup much easily. With 2 cotton pad and i'm done!

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Removes most make up after 1 swipe.  Removes all make up after 2 swipes. Was unfortunate enough to accidentally get some make up remover in  eye, but it didn't irritate the eye much. Has this unsettling smell when used but overall, a good and effective make up remover.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I have used other brands of micellar water before and i find that garnier's version is much more gentle and remove makeup really easily. It is also hydrating for me as i have dry skin. Would definitely recommend everyone to try.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Good cleansing water to remove my BB cream effectively. Skin felt mositurised and non sticky. Worth it for the price.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I have sensitive skin and this remover does it's job without irritating my skin further like most removers do. It's able to remove most face makeup effectively, but wouldn't use for eye makeup.

However i do feel after i use it that it leaves a slight film to my face and that i would still need to go in with a cleanser afterwards to feel more fresher. It is not a bad product overall.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I wear make up on a daily basis and I hate having to take it all off at the end of the day. However with the Garnier Micellar water, it doesnt take much time and effort. It is so gentle and effective in removing my make-up, even my water proof mascara and eyeliner! Been using it for over a year because of how amazing it is.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I have used other brands of micellar water before and i find that garnier's version is much more gentle and remove makeup really easily. It is also hydrating for me as i have dry skin. Would definitely recommend everyone to try.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: This is a must have for me. It is gentle on skin, and removes all my makup easily!

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: My fav makeup remover by far! It's not sticky, not oily and takes off my makeup effortlessly.

Product Name: [Super Value Pack] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Love that it doesn't leave a tacky residue. It leaves my face feeling refreshed. Great first step in my nightly skincare routine. I am sold.

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: This has no fragrance. It removes makeup really easily and cleanly. I do not need a lot of effort to remove my makeup. It is the best micellar water i tried so far. Will repurchase!

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I have been using this daily for a few months now. My skin has become more appealing and much more under control now. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone!!

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Easy application on wanting to remove my makeup, glides on the face easily. Bonus is when u're still gd if u dont dounle cleanse ur face.

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: What i love about Garnier miscellar cleansing water is that unlike other miscellar water, it's not sticky once you spill that on your face!!

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: A very good chance to try this Micellar cleansing water from Garnier as my allergies suddenly made it's appearance again.    Review:   This micellar water does what it says. My face never shows redness during the two days I use this product. It cleanses, soothes and more importantly, it doesn't irritate my sensitive skin.

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: When I purchased this product, i was a little bit hesitant but when I got to try this product, it really satisfies me. It's really nice to use. It's really recommendable for others to try out. The packaging is nice.The way it completely removes your make up is so legit. And it is legit amazing. I would really love.to buy this product again. And I would recommend it to my friends so that they can witness how beautiful and amazing this product is. I just really love how it feels on my skin and face. I just really love everything about it.

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I like how this product remove make up in an instant. No need to use several times just to remove your make up. Highly recommended with people who has sensitive skin.

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: First time using Garnier's Micellar water, it can cleanse my light makeup well with 1 cotton pad and it is very convenient to use. It can even remove my waterproof eyeliner well. For mascara, I will still prefer the oil type of remover.

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Received this product and enjoyed using it. It was light on my skin and didn't dry out my skin when I applied it. Definitely would recommend it to my friends and family who are looking for a good make-up remover.

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Removing makeup has never been this effortless before. it does not leave an oily feeling behind like other brands of remover. I will definitely use it again and the best part is, its suitable for sensitive skin. It does not sting my face like some products would!!

Review: Love how it doesn't irritate my eyes when i remove my eye make up and also the fragrance free as some people may be allergic to certain scent. Suitable for my super sensitive skin too as i tend to react almost immediately to a wrong product.

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I love how it remove my eye makeup by just one swipe and is so convenient to remove any other make up

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)

But this Micellar water is my holy grail - it's easy to clean my make up and it doesn't strip my face of its natural oil. So glad to be given this opportunity to try this!

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: It is gentle on skin, yet clean thoroughly.   No remaining make up on cotton when i clean 2nd time using toner.  Used for two nights and no redness or allergic reaction. I have combined skin and i dont feel tightness or tingling on cheeks area.  Will definitely recommend to friends.

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I have extremely sensitive skin and I am not able to use any oil-based make-up removers. I have tried other brands of micellar cleansing water before, but I feel that Garnier's All-In-1 Micellar Cleansing Water is very suitable for my sensitive skin and it works wonderfully!    Garnier's All-In-1 Micellar Cleansing Water removes my make-up with just a single and quick swipe, and it also leaves my skin feeling fresh and non-sticky too. Thus, there is no need to wash my face afterwards! I personally use Garnier's All-In-1 Micellar Cleansing Water to remove the dusts, oil and impurities off my face at the end of a busy and hectic day and I love it a lot!    The packaging is really cute and it is affordable too! I would continue to use this and I would also highly recommend this to anyone who has sensitive skin and is looking to invest in good micellar cleansing water.

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: tried this and it really removed my makeup effectively. very gentle on my skin, and it was very easy to use. feels nice on my skin, would recommend!

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: This micellar cleansing water works wonders! It removes all the makeup on my face within 2 swaps! I will definitely recommend it to friends and love ones and I will definitely buy more

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: This is my first time using the garnier all-in-1 micellar cleansing water.  It's very effective in removing my makeup, especially my eye makeup.  I only need 2 piece of cotton square puff to clean half my face.  Kuddos to the product!

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I use this product every day to remove my make-up including eye make-up and this does the job for me. It is unscented and I pour a bit onto a cotton pad and gently sweep it all over my face. But it does not remove waterproof make-up.

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: This is indeed a magical water that removes makeup super easily and its no rinse feature is another plus point. Thank you!

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I have used other micellar water products in the past, but they are either too pricey or not very effective. I have already tried the Garnier Micellar water in the past and have been using it ever since. It is really as gentle as it claims, yet effective to use. What I really like about it is the price. Such a big bottle for such an affordable price! I highly recommend people to try this :)

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Cleanser was gentle on my skin. It didn't leave my skin red or painful after using it, compared to others I've used before. Price wise, definitely a good investment. This will be my go to cleanser from now on!

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Thanks Try and review for letting have the chance to try it. Recently I also just bought  Micellar Cleansing Water but a different brand there is a big difference for this two. I more likely prefer the Garnier, after trying i found out that it is more effective on removing oil and my light make up. I like it more than the one I bought in pharmacy store i had use more cotton and more micellar water for the other brand. For Garnier i used only one that is a thumbs up for me make it 2 thumbs up.

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Removes most make up after 1 swipe.  Removes all make up after 2 swipes. Was unfortunate enough to accidentally get some make up remover in  eye, but it didn't irritate the eye much. Has this unsettling smell when used but overall, a good and effective make up remover.

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Yesterday night was my first try from Garnier brand. It was safely delivered to me days ago. *Thank you Garnier!*    I was so eager to try coz firstly, it mentioned that its removal for light makeup (which i am. I have been a light makeup for 3years now. Before that i used to have heavy makeup on).  Secondly, it mentioned its for sensitive skin. I have this sensitivity issue under my eyes & nose area, for years now. Yesterday night, tried and tested. And IM LOVING IT! I don't feel the tingling heaty on my sensitive areas though. And best best, after removing it, you can just straightaway go to bed. Really! No need to rinse after removing. Wow Garnier. I have used other brand, which is have been my fave. But that particular brand when i have used, the sticky feeling exist, so i have to rinse to get rid of the feeling ok my face. For garnier, its not though. Amazing! Garnier MW, you are on my fave list now! THANK YOU #GARNIERSG for sending over to me to try. Love it!

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I have been using other micellar water and I must say Garnier's micellar water removes makeup much easily. With 2 cotton pad and i'm done!

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Indeed, used only 1 cotton pad to remove my make up for the entire face. I feel refreshed and it feels like I already washed my face with a soap.    For the packaging, I prefer smaller size since expiration is just for 6M. And for the 400ml for 6M is too much as you only need a bit amount to remove makeup, unless you wear make up every single day. And it is quite pricey compare to other micellar cleansing water.

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Garnier All-in-1 Micellar Cleansing Water takes my makeup off gently and in one swipe. I absolutely love it as it doesn't leave my skin feeling greasy but mosturised at the same time. No oily residue! I am most impressed that when I am taking off eye makeup, I don't need to do a lot of rubbing plus it doesn't burn at all!

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I have used other brands of micellar water before and i find that garnier's version is much more gentle and remove makeup really easily. It is also hydrating for me as i have dry skin. Would definitely recommend everyone to try.

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I have sensitive skin and this remover does it's job without irritating my skin further like most removers do. It's able to remove most face makeup effectively, but wouldn't use for eye makeup.

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Good cleansing water to remove my BB cream effectively. Skin felt mositurised and non sticky. Worth it for the price.

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I have acne prone skin and i wear makeup on most days. This helps to remove my makeup at the end of my wear even if i have a setting spray on. However i do feel after i use it that it leaves a slight film to my face and that i would still need to go in with a cleanser afterwards to feel more fresher. It is not a bad product overall.

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: I wear make up on a daily basis and I hate having to take it all off at the end of the day. However with the Garnier Micellar water, it doesnt take much time and effort. It is so gentle and effective in removing my make-up, even my water proof mascara and eyeliner! Been using it for over a year because of how amazing it is.

Product Name: [Essential Micellar Set] Garnier Micellar Water Pink (For Sensitive Skin)
Review: Tried for 1 month. After applying not dry and also feeling not sticky too. overall just suitable for me

Product Name: Maybelline Falsies Push Up Angel Mascara
Review: I like this mascara and have been using this for last 2 years till it was discontinued at the maybelline counter. Was si disappointed and did not trust to order online in case it is not genuine. Thjs product is sent by loreal Singapore that is why I order it. Quality is excellent. Delivery is disappointing with 2 phone calls to find out when it will arrive as promised before 6pm. Last call to UFox to enquire delivery status about 5.40pm. The person said will call me after checking with the driver. He did not call me. When I call the office at 6.30pm, office automated reply that it is closed at 6pm. The man who promised to call me back did not bother to call back. The driver arrived late after before 9pm. Waste too much waiting.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Creamy texture which gives smooth application. Moreover, the tip is sharp, which gives a high ease when trying to colour the corners of the lips. However, the tip tends to be a bit hard as well.     Shortly after applying I felt that the ink is abit sticky on the lips, which went away after a while.  It is surprisingly very transfer proof, as it did not come off when I tried to rub it off with my fingers. However, when I tried to remove it with my make up remover, some of  the product stayed on my lips. Not sure if the product is too strong or the make up remover (water based) is weak.     The colour is highly pigmented which suits perfectly on my lips and I would highly recommend this product to everyone!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Super stay matte ink really stays! However, becareful not to apply wrongly as it is really difficult to remove. It will take a few mins to dry, after it dried, it really stays. Whether eating or drinking, it does not stain. I've been looking for a lip color that stays and this one really does the job.. it does accentuate the dry lines on my lips to a mild extent and also be sure to exfoliate the dead skin on your lips before applying this. I got the heroine color but it's too red for my liking.  I'll probably buy the other pinkish colors.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: I've tried this product with and without a lip moisturizer.  First day without a lip moisturizer base (Vaseline), it feels quite dry and cakey on my lips.  Second day I applied a thin layer of Vaseline before putting it on, it feels great. Needed very little touch up as I tend to wipe my mouth after a few bites of food.  This stays on quite nicely.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: The lip odour glided smoothly, stayed matte and required no touch ups as it was pretty much stuck to my lips. However, having said that, it can be a bit drying if no lipbalm was worn prior to application. The colour I was given was Lover. The shade on the casing looked perfect, however it‚Äôs brighter inside. Wish the content could be more similar to the colour on the casing. If Maybelline could make this less drying and true to shade, this would be the ideal lip product for all.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Loves how easy and smooth it is to apply on my lip! The color is able to stay on after a long day out, hence it is recommended for people who is lazy to constantly touching up.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: The Lipstick is easy to apply and colour stays on long and nice. It is comfortable and not feeling sticky or too watery. But the only downside of the lipstick is the smell. It will be better if there is fragrance added or reduce the strong smell.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Love the neutral color & texture is pretty smooth to apply on.  Superstay Matte Ink provides moisture to my lips as well, will definitely recommend to my friends!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: This stays on for long periods and it doesn't stain cups BUT it dries up the lips a little bit much. Overall still satisfactory

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Just tried it and it lives up to its superstay reputation. Lasted through the whole day despite oily food and coffee straight from a cup. Colour is cute and matte, has a slightly sticky feeling to it but still "superstay". Not too used to the applicator yet but it comes with practice. Would recommend!!!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: I think we‚Äôve become quite familiar with how this lippie has looked on me these couple of weeks! I received it from @tryandreviewasia and have been testing it out for a couple of weeks though I have not put it through a full 16 hours.  .  It‚Äôs a beautiful dark red liquid lipstick that is easy to apply with the tear drop shape applicator. I usually do it in the train on my way to dinner and have gotten a beautiful application everytime. It dries matte, isn‚Äôt drying. and does not transfer, all our lippie dreams come true. It sits very comfortably on top of a layer of lip balm and reapplies beautifully.  .  Unfortunately I am doubtful it will last the promised 16 hours on me without touch ups and I haven‚Äôt even tried. Why? Because it simply doesn‚Äôt last beyond a meal. The area around my mouth will disappear and I‚Äôm left with butt hole lips.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: I'm always a fan of lip products but can't find one that is really moisturising and can last me the whole day without touching up. All the products I tried claims that it can last the whole day but to my disappointment it didn't work and furthermore made my lips dry. I'm thankful and lucky to be able to try this amazing product and I can say it last me more than 16HR. I think it's super worth it because u can look pretty the whole day without constant touching up

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: It is abit dry. But it is very lasting. After meals most of my lipstick still stay.  However I have dry lips so it‚Äôs cracks abit

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Glides on smoothly.  Not as dry as majority of Matte Lipsticks.  Doesn't rub off easily even with greasy food.  Some cracking and wrinkling after eating and some pale spots but still looks almost flawless.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Went out for the night and had steamboat for dinner. Was amazed at how I didn't have to reapply the lipstick after dinner because it was so long-lasting. The only downside of this product is that it may be slightly dry on the lips, however, it can be fixed by applying lip balm after the lipstick :) Highly recommended to everyone!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Pros:   1) Definitely its lasting power! This does NOT come off even with Dettol/ Life Bouy soap! As clearly seen in the photos, after soaping, rubbing, scrubbing it on my hand after the hand swatch, this DOES not come off. Unbelievable. But that's exactly what ALL lipsticks should be.     2) Formula is ALSO better than Kylie J's - more fluid (greater for beginners) when applied, compared to Kylie's which is more creamy.     Verdict: Move over Kylie Liquid Lipsticks. This Maybelline Matte Ink is taking over!    Cons:  1) Slightly Sticky when applied on hand for swatch. However, this is not as apparent when on hand. :)    2) More range of colours please!   I wore the shade of No. 15 Lover, which reminds me alot like Kylie Jenner's liquid lipstick in Shade POSIE K. This may suit better on cool & fair skin tones. I personally suit nuder shades for my warm and slightly tan skin tone (shades like Kat Von D in Cathedral, Smashbox in Cognac, Wet n Wild in Give Me Mocha.)

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: I love that the color is very pigmented! However, in general, as matte lip products are very dry, I had to apply some lip mask/lip protector before applying this. Hence, the color will stain cups and burgers

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: First time using a liquid lisptick and I think I found myself a new fave lipstick - Maybelline's SuperStay Matte Ink

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: I had a heavy lunch and some desserts for tea break while wearing this and I was pleasantly surprised that I didn‚Äôt have to reapply throughout the day!!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Lipstick fades away fast from my lips and I've tried a few brands. If it doesn't disappear fast, I think leaves my lips dry.     This lipstick is exactly what my lips needs.     Colour range is awesome - though I'd love for them to have more.     Application is smooth! One dip is more than enough. Trust me. All you need I say to apply thin - or at least enough to cover your lips.     It stays more than 16hours. I know, I'm not supposed to, but I accidentally slept with it. It stayed until the next day. That's about 24hrs!    Doesn't smudge too unless it's exposed to liquids for too long. Ie: in the shower for 10 minutes with constant water running down my face. With that said, there's no transfers when eating or drinking.     Oh! It also doesn't leave my lips dry.     Smells good. In case this isn't the case for everyone, I got the shade Lover.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: It does really stay up to 16 hrs! Even after meals the lipstick does not come off. The only thing about it is that the applicator is not very good, it doesnt hold a lot of product & the first layer will not give you the coverage you want. It does need awhile longer to dry compared to other liquid lipsticks & when it does dry it feels sticky.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: The lip product does works as it promise...it does stay up quite long till its abit hard to remove....highly pigmentation..love the shade of red that was part of the few color that was produce.. and importance of matte lipstick... it does not make you lips chapping...

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Maybelline SuperStay Matte Ink keeps its name. It is really handy and easy to apply. I enjoyed my drinks without transferring the colour on glasses. :) and it actually stayed day long on lips giving me confidence to meet people without looking into mirror before. I somewhat found it sticky something like glue. Maybe matte liquids are like this as this was my first experience.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: I've been using this lip ink for about a week. The color pigment is very thick and creamy while applying, able to last for few hours on the lip but a little bit dry.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: There is a smooth finish that lasts all day despite having meals and drinks, it did not budge! Even after i removed it at the end of the day, there was a little bit of color that was left on my lips. Love this lip ink and definitely purchasing it in other shades!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: I really love this brand.  Especially the shades. When applying its very soft on the lips.  Now is my favorite lipstick..  I definitely buy again. Its a perfect and awesome producr.. I will recommend it to my friends 100 percent.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: I love the packaging! So pretty! It is highly pigmented and can last quite long. The texture is quite thick and needs some effort to spread. It has a strong smell though.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Okay so this is an interesting formular for a matte lippies. I have tons of reason to love it!     - it‚Äôs quick drying and transferproof.   - it‚Äôs sticky before it‚Äôs dries BUT its normal for a matte lippies.   - it has a velvet felt when u first applied BUT has a silky felt after. ( i even tried using lip balm over it and it‚Äôs okay!)   - Not only it‚Äôs pigmented and has vibrant colour, the one i received (creator) is a purple but has pink undertone and even after a greasy dinner i had it fade off and left a tint! Which is great  - The applicator of it‚Äôs great for matte lippies as i can outline my lips with it.     The only concern i have was, removing it. But there‚Äôs a specific ‚Äúeraser‚Äù for it. Or else it can last for almost a day!   I‚Äôll definitely use it again and buy the other colours too!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Lipstick is super pigmented with no doubt. Not liking the texture on my lip. Seems too sticky. Not recommended for ppl with dry lips. Dry line line will be quite obvious.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: The Maybelline Super Stay Matte Ink is perfect for my lips. It does not smudge or transfer hence it stays for a long time without having to touch up. Additionally, it does not crack or peel like other matte lipsticks may do and my lipstick do not feel dry.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: I just received the package yesterday and I tried it.  It is so perfect, I really love the color and it's very perfect on my lips.  It's matte and it stays longer as expected  I really love it

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: - Rich colour pigments with one swipe  - For a matte lipstick it transfer quite a bit but nothing too messy  - Long lasting even after i wiped it off with a make up remover towelette!  - Wide range of loud colour choices. My favourites!!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: The applicator is so sturdy that it's so easy to apply! And it stays forever! No smudging whatsoever no matter what I drank or ate. It was great and I loooooved the red! It's really a good buy for a matte lipstick!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Never thought that a light pink colour such as "Dreamer" would actually fit me! It goes on smoothly and isn't as drying as other matte lipsticks. Wore this out for dinner, although it cracks after contact (e.g. with food/water), the colour stays strong.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: The product is amazingly lasting. Even after eating or even after going for swimming. It is very easy to apply as well. Unlike other matte lipsticks, maybelline super stay lipstick doesnt leave that dry feeling and cracked look on your lips.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: I LOVE this lip stick!  I have very dry lips and i'm not someone who wear lipstick frequently due to the dryness and i'm a lazy person who doesnt like to touch up my make up. I've tried this lipstick on and for the whole day it stayed! The applicator is easy to use and precise. The only issue is, i prefers orangey shades but they doesnt come with it. The shade that i got is Lover and i personally think its too dark. Would wanna try the dreamer instead. And it'd be best if they launch more orangey shades!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: The SuperStay Matte Ink from Maybelline is perfect for everyday wear! It smells good, super pigmented and with the perfect contoured applicator, it's super easy & fast to apply on for panic mommies like me. Just so u know, I tested it for a whole day of household chores! It lasted. I drank with it, eat with it. Had to remove it with a makeup remover frankly. Didnt stain my teacups too. Honestly, i love it. Its not drying unlike my other matte lippies. Ok im buying other colours definitely!!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: The lip tint is a bit sticky when apply but the longevity of the lip tint  stays on it when eat and drink

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: I love how the pigment is strong and lasts throughout the day, literally.  However, the wand seems weird and its a bit hard to apply. Also, it has a sticky senstation through. Not forgetting to mention, it was so difficult to remove it!!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Really amazed how non drying this liquid lipstick is!     Blot the excess and it will set non sticky.     It does have a rather strong scent, but it's not an unpleasant one.     The doe foot applicator gives you the most precise application, which is really important if you're wearing darker shades.    On the staying power -it's definitely kiss proof ;)  I had a greasy dinner with it on and product only came off from the middle of my bottom lip; close to my inner lip. Definitely reaching for this when I attend weddings and events!     Used the shade Voyager- flattering shade for an Asian with sallow skin; my skin looked brighter wearing it.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: The smell is really sweet. It is very pigmented and bright in color. It is easy to apply. I would continue using it often.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Wow the formula for this is awesome, the pigmentation and it glides so one dip is all you need. Not drying at all...

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Creamy texture which gives smooth application. Moreover, the tip is sharp, which gives a high ease when trying to colour the corners of the lips. However, the tip tends to be a bit hard as well.     Shortly after applying I felt that the ink is abit sticky on the lips, which went away after a while.  It is surprisingly very transfer proof, as it did not come off when I tried to rub it off with my fingers. However, when I tried to remove it with my make up remover, some of  the product stayed on my lips. Not sure if the product is too strong or the make up remover (water based) is weak.     The colour is highly pigmented which suits perfectly on my lips and I would highly recommend this product to everyone!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Super stay matte ink really stays! However, becareful not to apply wrongly as it is really difficult to remove. It will take a few mins to dry, after it dried, it really stays. Whether eating or drinking, it does not stain. I've been looking for a lip color that stays and this one really does the job.. it does accentuate the dry lines on my lips to a mild extent and also be sure to exfoliate the dead skin on your lips before applying this. I got the heroine color but it's too red for my liking.  I'll probably buy the other pinkish colors.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: The lip odour glided smoothly, stayed matte and required no touch ups as it was pretty much stuck to my lips. However, having said that, it can be a bit drying if no lipbalm was worn prior to application. The colour I was given was Lover. The shade on the casing looked perfect, however it‚Äôs brighter inside. Wish the content could be more similar to the colour on the casing. If Maybelline could make this less drying and true to shade, this would be the ideal lip product for all.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Loves how easy and smooth it is to apply on my lip! The color is able to stay on after a long day out, hence it is recommended for people who is lazy to constantly touching up.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Love the neutral color & texture is pretty smooth to apply on.  Superstay Matte Ink provides moisture to my lips as well, will definitely recommend to my friends!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Just tried it and it lives up to its superstay reputation. Lasted through the whole day despite oily food and coffee straight from a cup. Colour is cute and matte, has a slightly sticky feeling to it but still "superstay". Not too used to the applicator yet but it comes with practice. Would recommend!!!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Just tried it and it lives up to its superstay reputation. Lasted through the whole day despite oily food and coffee straight from a cup. Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Glides on smoothly.  Not as dry as majority of Matte Lipsticks.  Doesn't rub off easily even with greasy food.  Some cracking and wrinkling after eating and some pale spots but still looks almost flawless.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Went out for the night and had steamboat for dinner. Was amazed at how I didn't have to reapply the lipstick after dinner because it was so long-lasting. The only downside of this product is that it may be slightly dry on the lips, however, it can be fixed by applying lip balm after the lipstick :) Highly recommended to everyone!

Review: I love that the color is very pigmented! However, in general, as matte lip products are very dry, I had to apply some lip mask/lip protector before applying this. Hence, the color will stain cups and burgers

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: First time using a liquid lisptick and I think I found myself a new fave lipstick - Maybelline's SuperStay Matte Ink

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: I had a heavy lunch and some desserts for tea break while wearing this and I was pleasantly surprised that I didn‚Äôt have to reapply throughout the day!!

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Lipstick fades away fast from my lips and I've tried a few brands. If it doesn't disappear fast, I think leaves my lips dry.     This lipstick is exactly what my lips needs.     Colour range is awesome - though I'd love for them to have more.     Application is smooth! One dip is more than enough. Trust me. All you need I say to apply thin - or at least enough to cover your lips.     It stays more than 16hours. I know, I'm not supposed to, but I accidentally slept with it. It stayed until the next day. That's about 24hrs!    Doesn't smudge too unless it's exposed to liquids for too long. Ie: in the shower for 10 minutes with constant water running down my face. With that said, there's no transfers when eating or drinking.     Oh! It also doesn't leave my lips dry.     Smells good. In case this isn't the case for everyone, I got the shade Lover.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: The lip product does works as it promise...it does stay up quite long till its abit hard to remove....highly pigmentation..love the shade of red that was part of the few color that was produce.. and importance of matte lipstick... it does not make you lips chapping...

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Maybelline SuperStay Matte Ink keeps its name. It is really handy and easy to apply. I enjoyed my drinks without transferring the colour on glasses. :) and it actually stayed day long on lips giving me confidence to meet people without looking into mirror before. I somewhat found it sticky something like glue. Maybe matte liquids are like this as this was my first experience.

Product Name: Superstay Matte Ink Liquid Lipstick - All Ranges by Maybelline
Review: Okay so this is an interesting formular for a matte lippies. I have tons of reason to love it!     - it‚Äôs quick drying and transferproof.   - it‚Äôs sticky before it‚Äôs dries BUT its normal for a matte lippies.   - it has a velvet felt when u first applied BUT has a silky felt after. ( i even tried using lip balm over it and it‚Äôs okay!)   - Not only it‚Äôs pigmented and has vibrant colour, the one i received (creator) is a purple but has pink undertone and even after a greasy dinner i had it fade off and left a tint! Which is great  - The applicator of it‚Äôs great for matte lippies as i can outline my lips with it.     The only concern i have was, removing it. But there‚Äôs a specific ‚Äúeraser‚Äù for it. Or else it can last for almost a day!   I‚Äôll definitely use it again and buy the other colours too!

Product Name: Instant Age Rewind Dark Circle Eraser - (2-in-1 Concealer + Treatment) by Maybelline
Review: One of my favourite undereye concealers - coverage is not fantastic but what you want this concealer for is its light texture, blendability, and brightening effect. Price cheaper here due to 11.11 sale vs price in stores. Have bought this many times in drugstores and will continue repurchasing.

Product Name: Instant Age Rewind Dark Circle Eraser - (2-in-1 Concealer + Treatment) by Maybelline
Review: Item came in good condition. Took a while to keep twisting until the fluid came out, but the coverage is really good

Product Name: Instant Age Rewind Dark Circle Eraser - (2-in-1 Concealer + Treatment) by Maybelline
Review: I have ordered 1 Honey & 1 Sand Colour in 2 separate order. On 19 Dec, I only received a Sand Colour and not Honey when I was asked to sign by their delivery courier, urban fox. I actually have submitted the details on this review but it's not reflected when I gave a 2 stars rating. The item I received on this order is Sand and also their invoice stated Sand Colour. Till date, I have yet to receive my other order but seller said I have acknowledged receipt. I was definitely very angry and upset when I realized that my signature has been fabricated. There're only 2 deliveries by urban fox. On 15 Dec, I received 2 Liese Hair colours and 19 Dec, a Sand Colour Concealer. I don't know where's my other order but I'm definitely sure that my signature has been fabricated. I pay for what I buy so I want my item. Why would I want to cheat you for a $14/- product. In view of this incident, I'm totally very upset about you and Lazada for simply ignore my concern.
